We will teach you to understand and speak foreign languages, with minimal effort.

The main idea of Babelkey is that you follow a tale or story as you hear it from your headphones in a foreign language. While the story is being told, you can read it as text on your screen. On the left side of the screen you can follow the course text in a foreign language, and on the right side of the screen you can quickly glance translations to words, which are yet unfamiliar to you. From the settings menu you can control the length of pauses before and after each sentence. \n In order for one to become fluent in a language, one needs a lot of repetition, so try to have the course playing in the background as often as possible, while doing other things.

From the settings menu you can control the length of pauses before and after each sentence. It is recommended that you control the pauses to suit your current needs, because this will impact your comfort of studying the language course.
Previous. Move to the previous sentence.
Next. Move to the next sentence.
Repeat. Enable/Disable repeat mode. In repeat mode the current sentence will be repeated until you disable repeat mode.
We will teach you to understand and speak foreign languages, with minimal effort.

Babelkey is a methodology for learning to speak and understand new languages with minimal effort, and it is the optimal method for studying languages on a mobile phone or other mobile device. 

Babelkey was developed by the Finnish Dr. Wille Mikkola back in 1980s, during the time when he travelled the world as a businessman/engineer/architect/artist. The Babelkey methodology was recently discovered to be a perfect match for today"'"s smart-phones and tablets, and we have since then been working on delivering it to your pocket. 

This Spanish course is a working demo and also a BETA version of our course player application. We will have proper courses published and made available for you as soon as possible. In the meanwhile please let us know what you think about the product.
